meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119.11 ::date 2015-08-25T22:06:51 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt I can respect your right to believe that. # ::save-date Tue Aug 25, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119_11.txt

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119.12 ::date 2015-08-25T22:08:25 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt I just don't think that once people think beyond the platitude of it and start to examine closely what it means in terms of the 1138 Federal government laws (at last count), plus hundreds of more state laws, in which marriage was a component of federal and state recognized "rights, responsibilities, and privileges" and that if suddenly the government stopped recognizing the family relationship established under Civil Marriage and all that that would take away from the people. # ::save-date Thu Feb 4, 2016 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119_12.txt
sentence: I just don't think that once people think beyond the platitude of it and start to examine closely what it means in terms of the 1138 Federal government laws (at last count), plus hundreds of more state laws, in which marriage was a component of federal and state recognized "rights, responsibilities, and privileges" and that if suddenly the government stopped recognizing the family relationship established under Civil Marriage and all that that would take away from the people.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119.13 ::date 2015-08-25T22:32:58 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The government stopping the recognition of a spouse will have a huge impact - one that I don't see you gaining a lot of support from heterosexuals for. # ::save-date Tue Aug 25, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119_13.txt
sentence: The government stopping the recognition of a spouse will have a huge impact - one that I don't see you gaining a lot of support from heterosexuals for.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119.14 ::date 2015-08-25T22:37:01 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt They say the hardest job in the military is being a military spouse and my wife was one for most of my military career. # ::save-date Fri Dec 22, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119_14.txt
sentence: They say the hardest job in the military is being a military spouse and my wife was one for most of my military career.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119.15 ::date 2015-08-25T22:42:35 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt As a retiree she has medical benefits and arrangements have been made (which are ONLY available to a legal spouse) that she will receive part of my retirement check if I were to pass before she does so that she will have something to care for herself with. # ::save-date Tue Aug 25, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119_15.txt
sentence: As a retiree she has medical benefits and arrangements have been made (which are ONLY available to a legal spouse) that she will receive part of my retirement check if I were to pass before she does so that she will have something to care for herself with.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119.16 ::date 2015-08-25T22:49:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Government non-recognition of Civil Marriage means she would have no security in our elder years because while she raised our children while I was off defending our country she would have no access to my Social Security nor my military retirement. # ::save-date Mon Jan 15, 2018 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119_16.txt
sentence: Government non-recognition of Civil Marriage means she would have no security in our elder years because while she raised our children while I was off defending our country she would have no access to my Social Security nor my military retirement.

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119.17 ::date 2015-08-25T22:57:18 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Similar situations exist both in the government sector and the private sector - government not recognizing Civil Marriage is not something that will gain large support. # ::save-date Tue Aug 25, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8883574_0119_17.txt
sentence: Similar situations exist both in the government sector and the private sector - government not recognizing Civil Marriage is not something that will gain large support.
